attributes.action: Make Britain a Centre of Excellence for Climate Change Remedial Technologies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motorised transport represents less than 5% of all CO2 emissions and Britain releases around 2% of global CO2.

Taxation should be used to really solve the problem of climate change and be used to pump prime British industry so that we provide 100% of the solution rather than be 2% of the problem.

The green taxes are not green they are just taxes - target the right issues and we'll solve the problem.
